author: Special Correspondent
text:
Several hundreds of devotees took part in the annual car festival of Arulmigu Mariamman Temple, an important event in the fortnight-long festivities during the last Tamil month of Panguni.

The deity in the well-decorated temple car of Chinna Mariamman was taken around important streets by devotees pulling the ropes. The devotees from various parts of the district and surroundings started streaming in from early morning.

Many showered petals on the car's path.
title: Car festival draws crowd
